# Claude Agent

This is a test agent in Claude format (no type/instructions in frontmatter).

## Purpose

This agent is designed for testing Claude-style agent definitions
where instructions are in the markdown body rather than frontmatter.

## Guidelines

- Follow Claude best practices
- Use clear communication
- Be helpful and accurate
